thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Aberdeen Diversified Income And Growth Trust posts 2017 revenue return per share of 5.31p

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aberdeen Diversified Income And Growth Trust posts 2017 revenue return per share of 5.31p
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Aberdeen Diversified Income And Growth Trust Plc:
* ‍REVENUE RETURN PER SHARE 2017: 5.31P​ * ‍NET ASSET VALUE TOTAL RETURN 2017 +7.6%​ * ‍OUR DISCOUNT, CALCULATED USING AN NAV WITH DEBT AT FAIR VALUE AND EXCLUDING INCOME, IMPROVED FROM 6.9% TO 3.1% OVER YEAR, AND HAD NARROWED FURTHER TO 2.3% AT TIME OF WRITING​ Further company coverage: (Reporting by Dasha Afanasieva)
